job_details.Vacaturetitel: Senior Software Engineer, DevSecOps Release Mgmt, R&D Digital Products
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Your Role : We are looking for an innovation-centric Senior Software Engineer, DevSecOps Release Management ( R&D ) to join our IT R&D (Research & Development) Team who is passionate about leading the O rganizational T ransformation in developing DevSecOps tooling, practices, and culture for Genmab's Research and Development Department . You will contribute to R&D-wide DevSecOps requirements and ensure adoption of same, including observability, scalability, availability, security, cost performance. The Senior Software Engineer will also be responsible for DevSecOps technical expertise in Product-oriented-delivery teams, and ensuring that the PODs are executed on time , working with a team of architects and developers . The Senior Software Engineer will support R esearch , Discovery and D evelopment activities and leverage DevSecOps tool kits such as GitLab SaaS v ersion control software, Terraform, Cloud Formation, to ensure smooth and secure delivery of R&D
   Digital Products, build and deploy scalable and resilient applications. The Senior Software Engineer, DevSecOps Release Management will be instrumental in maintaining robust CI/CD pipelines, enhancing security practices, optimizing cloud resource managemen t , driving operational efficiency and success for the R&D Organization.

   This position will be based out of our Princeton, NJ , Copenhagen, DK or Utrecht, NL and onsite 60% .

   Your Responsibility :
     * Develop and maintain CI/CD pipelines using GitLab to streamline testing, deployment, and monitoring of applications and their associated infrastructure for software applications and systems used by the R&D Organization for R&D functions such as Research Informatics, SDMS (Scientific Data Management System), Lab Management Systems, Lab and Data Integrations, Research Data products, Pathology, Imaging, Pharmacology, Development Operations etc.
     * Lead Dev Sec Ops design and execution for IT R&D applications, working with DevSecOps CoE and Infrastructure/Operations team using the likes of GitLab, Kubernetes, AWS Cloud Formation, AWS Systems Manager, AWS Config, etc.
     * Architect and manage infrastructure as code, utilizing tools like Terraform, Ansible, or similar, to provision and manage resources across cloud environments.

     * Implement and manage CI/CD pipelines , containerization with modular architecture using microservices, infrastructure provisioning and management, ensuring rapid and reliable application deployment.
     * Optimize cloud resource utilization by designing and implementing efficient automation scripts , monitoring resources , and proactively addressing resource-related issues.
     * Establish and enforce Dev Sec Ops best practices, including version control, code review, automated testing, and deployment strategies for continuous integration, continuous delivery, and automated testing.
     * Collaborate with Security and Compliance teams to ensure teams are adhering to industry best practices and regulatory requirements. Create and maintain automated security testing tools to identify vulnerabilities and security risks , collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure security practices align with industry standards.
     * E xecute vulnerability assessment, threat modeling, compliance standards, security automation, secure coding practices, adhering to best practices for GxP, GDPR and other regulatory compliance.
     * Monitor and analyze DevSecOps pipelines and practices, identifying areas for improvement, optimization, and automation to enhance launch/failback consistency and accuracy.
     * Identify opportunities to use AI tools in DevSecOps related tasks such as Application Security and monitoring, testing (unit, integration, SAST, DAST), integrating security in DevSecOps pipeline, monitoring vulnerabilities, reporting security issues for driving productivity and efficiency.
     * Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams including colleagues from Data & Analytics, Data Science & AI and Infrastructure Platform Engineering teams, Technical Product Owners, Technical Delivery leads, developers, data engineers, visualization engineers, data scientists, AI/ML e ngineers, b ioinformaticians, understand R&D domain-specific requirements and translate them into DevSecOps technical delivery.
     * Embrace the Agile framework and Product-oriented-delivery , the iterative and incremental approach for solving technical problems to deliver IT R&D Digital products .
     * Contribute to documentation, knowledge sharing within the engineering tea m and clearly communicate the function of release automation specifications , and procedures .
     * Keep up to date with emerging data technologies, trends, and best practices, and make recommendations for their adoption within the Organization's DevSecOps ecosystem.
     * Play a pivotal role in enabling infrastructure automation for application deployment, continuous improvement , and optimization of infrastructure, monitor and manage the cloud resources and coordinate/collaborate across teams within IT to empower our scientists and researchers in R&D.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Software Engineer, DevSecOps Release Mgmt, R&D Digital Products

Your Role : We are looking for an innovation-centric Senior Software Engineer, DevSecOps Release Management ( R&D ) to join our IT R&D (Research & Development) Team who is passionate about leading the O rganizational T ransformation in developing DevSecOps tooling, practices, and culture for Genmab's Research and Development Department . You will contribute to R&D-wide DevSecOps requirements and ensure adoption of same, including observability, scalability, availability, security, cost performance. The Senior Software Engineer will also be responsible for DevSecOps technical expertise in Product-oriented-delivery teams, and ensuring that the PODs are executed on time , working with a team of architects and developers . The Senior Software Engineer will support R esearch , Discovery and D evelopment activities and leverage DevSecOps tool kits such as GitLab SaaS v ersion control software, Terraform, Cloud Formation, to ensure smooth and secure delivery of R&D
   Digital Products, build and deploy scalable and resilient applications. The Senior Software Engineer, DevSecOps Release Management will be instrumental in maintaining robust CI/CD pipelines, enhancing security practices, optimizing cloud resource managemen t , driving operational efficiency and success for the R&D Organization.

   This position will be based out of our Princeton, NJ , Copenhagen, DK or Utrecht, NL and onsite 60% .

   Your Responsibility :
     * Develop and maintain CI/CD pipelines using GitLab to streamline testing, deployment, and monitoring of applications and their associated infrastructure for software applications and systems used by the R&D Organization for R&D functions such as Research Informatics, SDMS (Scientific Data Management System), Lab Management Systems, Lab and Data Integrations, Research Data products, Pathology, Imaging, Pharmacology, Development Operations etc.
     * Lead Dev Sec Ops design and execution for IT R&D applications, working with DevSecOps CoE and Infrastructure/Operations team using the likes of GitLab, Kubernetes, AWS Cloud Formation, AWS Systems Manager, AWS Config, etc.
     * Architect and manage infrastructure as code, utilizing tools like Terraform, Ansible, or similar, to provision and manage resources across cloud environments.

     * Implement and manage CI/CD pipelines , containerization with modular architecture using microservices, infrastructure provisioning and management, ensuring rapid and reliable application deployment.
     * Optimize cloud resource utilization by designing and implementing efficient automation scripts , monitoring resources , and proactively addressing resource-related issues.
     * Establish and enforce Dev Sec Ops best practices, including version control, code review, automated testing, and deployment strategies for continuous integration, continuous delivery, and automated testing.
     * Collaborate with Security and Compliance teams to ensure teams are adhering to industry best practices and regulatory requirements. Create and maintain automated security testing tools to identify vulnerabilities and security risks , collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure security practices align with industry standards.
     * E xecute vulnerability assessment, threat modeling, compliance standards, security automation, secure coding practices, adhering to best practices for GxP, GDPR and other regulatory compliance.
     * Monitor and analyze DevSecOps pipelines and practices, identifying areas for improvement, optimization, and automation to enhance launch/failback consistency and accuracy.
     * Identify opportunities to use AI tools in DevSecOps related tasks such as Application Security and monitoring, testing (unit, integration, SAST, DAST), integrating security in DevSecOps pipeline, monitoring vulnerabilities, reporting security issues for driving productivity and efficiency.
     * Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams including colleagues from Data & Analytics, Data Science & AI and Infrastructure Platform Engineering teams, Technical Product Owners, Technical Delivery leads, developers, data engineers, visualization engineers, data scientists, AI/ML e ngineers, b ioinformaticians, understand R&D domain-specific requirements and translate them into DevSecOps technical delivery.
     * Embrace the Agile framework and Product-oriented-delivery , the iterative and incremental approach for solving technical problems to deliver IT R&D Digital products .
     * Contribute to documentation, knowledge sharing within the engineering tea m and clearly communicate the function of release automation specifications , and procedures .
     * Keep up to date with emerging data technologies, trends, and best practices, and make recommendations for their adoption within the Organization's DevSecOps ecosystem.
     * Play a pivotal role in enabling infrastructure automation for application deployment, continuous improvement , and optimization of infrastructure, monitor and manage the cloud resources and coordinate/collaborate across teams within IT to empower our scientists and researchers in R&D.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on DevSecOps, CI/CD pipelines, release management, and infrastructure as code. While it mentions collaboration with Data Science & AI and AI/ML engineers, and the potential use of AI tools for DevSecOps tasks, the core responsibilities and technologies listed are not directly related to building, training, or fine-tuning AI models themselves. The role is primarily about enabling the secure and efficient delivery of R&D digital products through robust engineering practices, rather than developing AI solutions. Therefore, it falls under the 'Ambiguous' category as it's a technical role but not directly focused on AI development or ML engineering as defined in the coding book.
